title: Application for Permanent Residence for Employees

description.short: An application for permanent residence in Botswana for employees.
description.long: This is an application for permanent residence in Botswana specifically designed for employees. The application is intended for individuals who are employed in Botswana and wish to obtain permanent residency in the country. The application process requires the submission of specific information and supporting documents to establish the employment relationship and eligibility for permanent residency. This application is subject to review and approval by the relevant authorities, ensuring that the applicants meet the criteria for permanent residency in Botswana as employees.

ministry: Ministry of Labour and Home Affairs

fields.fieldLabel: I hereby declare that the information provided in this application is true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. I understand that any misrepresentation or material omission made on this application form or other document requested by the Organization renders a staff member of the United Nations liable to termination or dismissal.
